Articles.Content: I wonder uf the bdc team are going to make another bdarmory for ksp2? Just wondering.
Thread moved from KSP 2 Mod Development to KSP 2 Mod Discussion.
From what I know about the BDA team and with ksp2 in its current state it wouldn't be very likely for it to be soon
No word on BD Armory itself, but there are two threads on the KSP Modding Society discord server for similar mods.  Sticks Armory was the earlier one; Kerbal Konquest is the second.

On 2/27/2023 at 5:34 PM, Kindok said:

Je me demande si l’équipe bdc va faire un autre bdarmory pour ksp2? Demandais

The mod was abandoned. But someone else promised us a BDA2, so I guess so.
